name: akibeks-construction

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=app && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=app && npm install --workspace=server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules app/node_modules server/node_modules app/build server/dist
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=app && npm run type-check --workspace=server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=app && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.security-audit: npm audit && npm audit --workspace=app && npm audit --workspace=server
scripts.status: echo '🔍 Server Status Check...' && curl -s http://localhost:3000 >/dev/null && echo '✅ App: Running on :3000' || echo '❌ App: Not running' && curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/health >/dev/null && echo '✅ Server: Running on :5000' || echo '❌ Server: Not running'
scripts.test:security: echo '🔒 Testing security headers...' && curl -I http://localhost:5000/api/health 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'X-Frame|X-Content|X-XSS' || echo '❌ Security headers test failed'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo '✅ Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development.'
scripts.restructure:cleanup: echo '🧹 Cleaning up old structure...' && rm -rf frontend backend && echo '✅ Old directories removed'
scripts.analyze:security: echo '🔐 Running security analysis...' && npm run security-audit && echo '✅ Security analysis complete'
scripts.optimize:icons: echo '🎨 Optimizing icon usage...' && grep -r 'react-icons' app/src --include='*.tsx' | wc -l && echo ' icon imports found'
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run type-check && npm run build && npm run security-audit
scripts.env:validate: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const required=['DATABASE_URL','JWT_SECRET']; const missing=required.filter(v=>!process.env[v]); if(missing.length) { console.error('Missing env vars:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Environment validation passed');"

author: Akibeks Construction Ltd
postinstall: echo "✅ Akibeks Construction - Enhanced Security Ready! Run 'npm run env:validate' to check configuration, then 'npm run dev' to start."
